name: rag_system

step1.description: Split documents into overlapping chunks of 512 tokens

step2.description: Embed chunks with RETRIEVAL_DOCUMENT task type

step3.description: Save embeddings with metadata in ChromaDB

step4.description: Embed user queries with RETRIEVAL_QUERY task type

step5.description: Find top-k similar chunks using cosine similarity

step6.description: Add retrieved context to LLM prompt

sample_documents: The Earth orbits around the Sun once every 365.25 days.
Water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius and boils at 100 degrees.
The speed of light in vacuum is approximately 299,792,458 meters per second.
DNA is composed of four nucleotide bases: adenine, thymine, guanine, and cytosine.
The Great Wall of China is over 13,000 miles long.
sample_queries: How long does Earth take to orbit the Sun?
What are the components of DNA?
Tell me about the Great Wall
optimization_tips: Use 768 dimensions for optimal balance of quality and storage
Batch embed documents for better throughput
Use metadata filtering before similarity search
Consider hybrid search (semantic + keyword) for best results
notes: Always normalize embeddings for consistent similarity scores
Use different task types for documents vs queries
